name: Tapighosta
description:
Ghostly the friendly ghost was heading home from his go-to bubble tea store and took the back route through the forest and fields, but he spilled his tea! And even worse, the GhostThrusters team are on the case and are trying to capture him! Get the tapioca pearls back!

This was developed by a team of 2 - this is our very first game jam! The gameplay isn't fully fleshed out and there are issues, but we are surprised with what we could get done in just a weekend!

Zac Hirst - Character design & modelling, environment design & modelling, game design, sound design

Jamie Nicholas - Programming & technical implementation, game design
